abstract: The Treasury Department recently unveiled its plan to lift mortgage-linked securities off banks’ balance sheets. But Citigroup and Bank of America have been buying those assets in a hurry from the secondary market, The New York Post reported.

headline.main: Citi, Bank of America Buy Mortgage Securities in Bulk
